body: Bahama Pundit's Larry Smith notes that "a recent report...has confirmed that poaching by commercial fishermen from the Dominican Republic is the greatest single threat to Bahamian seafood resources."
original_body: Bahama Pundit's Larry Smith notes that "a recent report...has confirmed that poaching by commercial fishermen from the Dominican Republic is the greatest single threat to Bahamian seafood resources."
title: Bahamas, D.R.: Fish Poaching
